# Examples
Setup 
```shell
npm install
# OR
yarn
```

## Less
### node
```shell
cd examples/less/node
node ./index.js
```
### Gulp
```shell
cd examples/less/gulp
gulp build
```


## PostCSS
### node
```shell
cd examples/postcss/node
node ./index.js
```
### Gulp
```shell
cd examples/postcss/gulp
gulp build
```


## Sass
### node
```shell
cd examples/sass/node
node ./index.js
```
### Gulp
```shell
cd examples/sass/gulp
gulp build
```


## SCSS
### node
```shell
cd examples/scss/node
node ./index.js
```
### Gulp
```shell
cd examples/scss/gulp
gulp build
```


## Stylus
### node
```shell
cd examples/stylus/node
node ./index.js
```
### Gulp
```shell
cd examples/stylus/gulp
gulp build
```
